name: SurveySynth
author: Alexander Barker
Jason Bjornholm
Logan Kunze
En-Chi Lee
Parker London
preview: An experimental browser-based interactive work that transforms real-time audience-written text into ever-changing music and visuals

name: Unified Localisation of Mass over Oceans (ULMO)
author: Christopher Harig
En-Chi Lee
preview: A pipeline for using GRACE satellite gravimetry and altimetry-steric (in development) measurements to study ocean mass change over ocean basins, with extended functionalities for Slepian functions and sea level equation modelling
